Source: Believing only they can counter the threat to Tamriel, the Elder Races have founded the Aldmeri Dominion. High Elves, Wood Elves, and the feline Khajiit have formed an alliance of mysticism, cunning, and ferocity.

The Ebonheart Pact was forged in war when eastern Tamriel was invaded by the Akaviri. The Nords of Skyrim, Dark Elves of Morrowind, and Free Argonians united to oppose them. The Pact endured, and confronts new perils as one.

Surrounded by enemies, the Bretons, Redguards, and Orcs of the Iliac Bay have united to form the Daggerfall Covenant. They fight to protect their people and, if possible, to save all Tamriel from the dire forces that threaten it.
